entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure illink packages flow to source build #80319
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Casting INumber<T> to int and double #80318
  • 'Tail' arrays? (An embedded or inline array at the end of a reference type.) #80315
  • [API Proposal]: X509Certificate.ExportPkcs12 with PBE parameters #80314
  • [API Proposal]: `CollectionsMarshal.CreateList<T>(T[])` #80311
  • [browser] more cancelation tests #80309
    Future
  • `XmlWellFormedWriter` ignores `XmlWriterSettings.NewLineOnAttributes` for attributes specifically named `xmlns` #80306
  • Can't add typed HttpClient for BackgroundService #80303
  • An `extern` method without a body causes its entire containing type to fail to load. #80300
  • Improving the area assignment experience #80296
  • How to get millisecond in DataTable Date column? #80291
  • Linux/MacOS: System.IO.Ports.SerialPort does not open with baudrate 111,865 #80288
  • [release/7.0] CI failure: Build Linux x64 release SourceBuild, unable to optimize assemblies for performance, runtime package not found #80284
  • Build breaks in profiling samples #80280
    8.0.0
  • TestResourceManagerIsSafeForConcurrentAccessAndEnumeration fails intermittently in CI #80277

Closed

  • dotnet 2.1.4 application is crashing on libcoreclr.so with signal: 'Aborted' #46949
    Future
  • Builds targeting rid win7-x64 don't actually target win7-x64 #80304
  • DateOnly.Parse throwing "not recognized as a valid DateOnly" for certain values on sv-FI on Linux only #80313
  • Regex with GeneratedRegex attribute is slower in some cases #80317
  • [release/6.0] Test failure: profiler/multiple/multiple/multiple.sh #67605
    6.0.x
  • !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(!"Detected use of a corrupted OB JECTREF. Possible GC hole.") running tests under VS debugger #75641
    Future
  • createdump fails to collect actionable dumps on macOS 13 Ventura #79355
    7.0.x
  • Canceling `JSHost.ImportAsync` fails because `dynamic_import` in `invoke-js.ts` is not cancelable #80028
    7.0.x
  • Importing an ECC private key, from D value, without public key #80305
  • Build analysis failing with "/eng/pipelines/runtime-sanitized.yml (Line: 14, Col: 12): Unexpected value ''" #80290
  • Expose `WebSocketMessageFlags` in `ClientWebSocket` #77783
    6.0.x
  • Support SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #78193
    6.0.x
  • string.IndexOf(string) gives incorrect result for some single-character args #80298
  • Assertion failure: uint32_t GCEvent::Impl::Wait(uint32_t, bool): Assertion `(st != 110) || !m_state' failed #80166
  • Safety of Memory.Pin for Memory instances created with CreateFromPinnedArray #80055
  • TryAddEnumerable for HttpClients #80202
  • EntryPointNotFoundException when having a dependency with the same name as a Windows DLL #79878
    8.0.0
  • How to enable FIPS mode in .net 6 applications in windows 10 platform #80289
  • [Mono] Remainder example fails for LLVMFullAot #79022
    8.0.0
  • Extend usage of optimized JIT helpers for memcpy/memove. #6676
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] crash when a background GC thread exits and run pre-mortem callbacks. #80262
  • CI: *Lot* of builds broken - `System/Numerics/Matrix4x4.cs(1785,43): error CA1857: The argument should be a constant for optimal performance` #80281
    8.0.0
  • Tests failed: Wasm.Build.Tests.BlazorWasmBuildPublishTests due to SIGKILL #70985
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests - blazor run tests failing #79514
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • remove UUID section superseded by RFC 4122 #80320
  • Fix failing official build #80316
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] [browser] make dynamic import cancelable #80312
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Report more accurately when loop unrolling changes the IR #80310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Move microbenchmarks, and blazor SOD runs to net8.0 #80308
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Updated type of heap_segment_survived from int to size_t to facilitate survival > 2GB. #80302
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Get entry assembly name from host for GetProcessInfo2 command during suspension #80301
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [WIP] Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix purity of CORINFO_HELP_GETREFANY on win-x64 #80292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fixing compressed singlefile scenario on osx-arm64 #80283
    Servicing-consider, area-Single-File, 7.0.x
  • Mark Task.IsFaulted as ensuring that Task.Exception is non-null #80278
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Use QueueUserAPC2 in GC suspension, if available. #80087
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve logging of GC ref map mismatches #80219
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] remove duplicate load of register #80285
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve jiterpreter heuristic branch handling #80275
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] add a total wasm bytes quota to the jiterpreter; adjust parameters #80266
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Update copyright guidance for Creative Commons #80272
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing the race condition while modifying pending_ops #80190
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.3
  • [browser] make dynamic import cancelable #80257
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor post phase checks #80194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JitHashTable iteration to range-based `for` #80265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SimdAsHWIntrinsic improvements and cleanup #80134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix alignment of interp stack on 32-bit platforms #80299
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, runtime-mono
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Fixed decompose_flag propagation issues #79855
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.3
  • Fix embedded coreclr detection in corhost.cpp #80294
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improving the SIMD codegen for SIMD12 load/store #80083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove incorrect assert from UnixEvent::Wait #80270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT: Update expected blazor tfm to net8.0 to match the latest sdk #80241
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • disable SendFileGetsCanceledByDispose on MacOS #80286
    area-System.Net.Sockets, disabled-test, os-mac-os-x
  • Add more precise tracking of static bases #80093
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert MemoryMarshal.GetArrayDataReference to a JIT intrinsic #79760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Disable dedup for wrapper with a return type which has a … #80279
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/7.0] fix wasm timestamp test by adding 10M tolerance #80250
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, 7.0.3
  • [NativeAOT] Do not run managed pre-mortem callbacks for GC threads. #80276
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make metadata reader smaller #80224
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix a build error around the ConstantExpected analyzer #80282
    area-System.Numerics
  • Annotate platform specific hardware intrinsics with the ConstExpected attribute #80192
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use function pointers instead of marshalled delegates in EventSource #79970
    area-Tracing-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm] optimize out 'is this method MulticastDelegate.Invoke' checks in aot->interp transitions #80181
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add IsDynamicCodeSupported Feature Switch #80246
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix alloc/dealloc mismatches and some buffer overruns found by ASAN #80189
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Add a pass of early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision for implicit byrefs #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #79014
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add SslClientAuthenticationOptions.ClientCertificateContext #80182
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rewrite how Matrix3x2 and Matrix4x4 are implemented #80091
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Restore Advance when reading float/double with XmlBufferReader. #80274
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Make System.Reflection.Emit public types abstract #78544
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Enable dedup by default. #80260
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Do not override content root with default #79411
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0][Android] Fix SslStream on legacy Android API levels #79277
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 6.0.14
  • [release/6.0] Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #80209
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0] Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #80188
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fall back to a canonical SIMD handle in gtGetStructHandleForSimdOrHW #80240
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Enable new analyzers CA1510/11/12/13 and CA1856/57/58 #80149
    area-Meta
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure only one empty string exists in the UserString heap. #80273
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Use PackedIndexOfIsSupported checks in more places #80254
  • [wasm][debugger][libs] Documentation: How to debug library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Run library tests with v8 --experimental-wasm-eh #80271
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Emit only virtual methods of instances when a class insta… #80267
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Reduce the number of forced `MethodTable`s #79594
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: packages not publishing #2153

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Delete pointee type related Jit/EE APIs #2154
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement a few more opcodes #2150
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: merge the change to running tests #2143

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: dispatch #2145
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: test PR for Exception handling dispatch upstream #2149

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • If PublishSingleFile=true is set in the project file it changes the behavior of dotnet build and similar #29795
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression]With .Net 8 SDK installed, publish blazorwasm project failed with error "error NETSDK1144: Optimizing assemblies for size failed..." #29792

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29810
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29808
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • Add DynamicCodeSupport Feature Switch #29785

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29776
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29775
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29753
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve the stage 0 template error message to be actionable #29783
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Copying the files to publish intermediate path to help with .NET SDK container publish #29805
    Area-WebSDK

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2081785 #29747
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.4xx backport) #29548
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.3xx. backport) #29583
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.1xx backport) #29579
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use UTF-8 Encoding by Default On Windows On Non English Languages #29755
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary sources from the test used nuget.config file to reduce 429s #29372
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.EnsureJsonTrimmability host configuration #29719
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add vb item templates #29765
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for new output path format #29599

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `SyntaxGenerator` swaps `protected internal` modifier #66295
  • CodeStyle options in Tools|Options showing up with some sort of ToString'ed version of our option type. #66291
    17.6
  • Method dropdown selects a random item when a different item is clicked #66290

Closed

  • Visual Studio 2022 17.4 Task list shows incorrect priority #66292
  • Contract failure in PreviewSolutionCrawlerRegistrationService.UnregisterAsync on disposal of tools options preview #66106
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33306.131 #66298
  • ChangeSignatureCodeRefactoringProvider throws a NullReferenceException #66224
  • ChangeSignatureCodeRefactoring encountered an Error #66086
  • `async` and `required` should be mutually exclusive #66088
  • Add editorconfig support for `is null` instead of == null (and `not` variant) #65572
  • Report error implementing unannotated interface member with `[UnscopedRef]` member #64508
    17.5
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33305.247 #66279

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify and fix handing of references not yet added #66303
    Area-IDE
  • Log source differences to files even when apply changes are blocked #66302
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update telemetry version to 16.5.28 #66299
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update publishData.json #66297
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix 'protected internal' accessibility modifier keyword order #66296
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support task list priorities in LSP #66294
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2081121 #66287
  • Report error referencing method from module with unrecognized RefSafetyRulesAttribute version #66285
    Area-Compilers
  • Doc relationship between GetUsedAssemblyReferences and DocumentationMode #66284
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Promote regular item to "Preferred" state #66278
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • If we hit an exception while indexing, say which document it was with and try to recover #66277
    Area-IDE, Next
  • (17.5) Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66280
    Area-Compilers
  • Change Signature + Add Parameter Dialogue Fixes #66301
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Avoid contract failures in PreviewSolutionCrawlerRegistrationService … #66239
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix priorities being incorrect in the task list. #66293
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove workarounds for fixed issues #66267
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Include LSP loghub logs when collecting watson dumps for NFW #66281
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Apply XAML template on AbstractCheckBoxViewModel instead of one specific subclass #66238
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66276
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66286
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2080925 #66283
  • Include [UnscopedRef] parameter attributes in synthesized delegate types #66035
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66282
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [LSP] Temporarily report NFWs in `RangeToTextSpan` #66259
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Report error implementing interface with `[UnscopedRef]` member #66024
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Updated

  • Handle capturing of primary constructor parameters within queries and in type-or-value scenarios #66254
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.5
  • Ensure that side effects of conditional access on an instance of a nullable type are not preserved in generic code #66250
    Area-Compilers
  • Add experimental API #65831
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE
  • Optimize StringBuilder calculations for netcoreapp3.1 and newer #66156
    Area-Compilers
  • Block `delegate*<void>...enum` constants in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Emit stackalloc block initializer for byte-sized enums #66251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Emit defensive copy for constrained call on `in` parameter #66189
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66031
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs API Review

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #45929
  • net7.0 101 file upload crashes stackoverflow #45928
  • Generating code for an OpenAPI Service Reference fails if the path to the swagger file has spaces in it. #45926
  • [Blazor] PersistentComponentState with Newtonsoft JSON #45925
  • Route Matching mismatching #45922
  • [Blazor] Added list item gets nested elements from other list item #45919
  • IAsyncEnumerable buffer the results and not yield it as stream. #45916
  • [Blazor] Calling async method inside CreateMauiApp #45913
  • [Blazor] JS Interop in Blazor MAUI #45912
  • [AOT] Meta issue for warnings from outside of aspnetcore #45911
  • EPIC: Support publishing ASP.NET Core API apps with Native AOT (WIP) #45910
    8.0

Closed

  • Results.File and Results.Stream consume large amount of Memory, don't stream file directly anymore #45037
    7.0.x
  • `RequestDelegateMetadataResult.CachedFactoryContext` is unused, resulting in unnecessary work #45840
    8.0-preview1
  • Minimal APIs : Endpoint route returning 404 not found. #45790
  • The thrown exception's message is completely useless... #44895

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Kestrel transports to solution filters #45933
  • Using `JsonTypeInfo` to read request body in RDF #45932
    area-web-frameworks
  • Improve loc of Win bundle installers #45927
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-localization
  • Add infrastructure for RequestDelegateGenerator #45924
  • Update README.md #45920
    community-contribution
  • Add MVC ambiguous route analyzer #45915
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix DefaultProblemDetailsWrite polymorphism #45906
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Use CachedFactoryContext #45865
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Remove cruft from Win bundle installers #45909
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, 8.0-preview1
  • Avoid deprecated `set-output` and bump action version #45907
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [AOT] Add middleware reflection fallback #45890
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3026483` to `71140c3` #45823
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `93f08be` to `71140c3` #45825
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [blazor][wasm] unify startup bit more #45628
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 8.0
  • Adding untyped JsonTypeInfo overloads #45593
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Added copy parameters to enable parallel build #45779
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix support for parameter names sourced from attributes (#45572) #45591
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Update to net8.0 SDK #45879
    area-infrastructure
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45878
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Backport deletion of playwright tests #45852
    6.0.x
  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2081430 #45630
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Fixed bug - Passing options to UseStaticFiles breaks Blazor Server #45897
    area-blazor
  • Add ambiguous route analyzer #45582
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • VS 2022 can't open dotnet-dump collect #3589

Updated

  • ETL file shows the start of a heap dump but not its completion #3570
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Change tool TFMs to net6.0 and drop 3.1 hosting support #3588

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editors not scrollable on iOS/Catalyst #12485
  • EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGKILL (Code Signature Invalid)) - App crashes when starting #12483
  • Display issues on MacCatalyst when multiple shell content is present inside a tab #12479
  • ShellContent.IsEnabled = false #12478
  • PlatformStringSizeService issues #12476
  • Blazor Maui Listening on public port, access is denied #12475
  • OData.Client throws ArgumentException #12474
  • ControlTemplate not propagating the BindingContext correctly #12470
  • RefreshView.IsRefreshing doesn't work with OneWay bindings #12469
    Backlog
  • IValueConverter is continuously triggering for TextColor property of Label while implicit style is applied #12465
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in `ShellToolbarAppearanceTracker.SetColors` on Android #12460
    Backlog
  • WSA or Android Emulator fails to render BindableLayouts content, although in Windows everything is fine #12459

Closed

    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix winui titleview measure #12484

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using a DateTimeOffset created in a GroupBy fails to convert string to TimeSpan #30001
  • Issue/PR 30,000! Let's celebrate! #30000
  • Make the RelationalModel DebugView available at runtime #29999
  • Optimize SQL if shared column predicate is being checked for every discriminator in a complete discriminator mapping #29998
    Backlog
  • Reconfiguring property as navigation should remove referenced indexes #29997
    Backlog
  • Entities in collections are not tracked after AddRangeAsync is called #29996

Closed

  • An instance of analyzer Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.InternalUsageDiagnosticAnalyzer #29984
  • Auto project columns based on `AsQueryable<T>` and `AsEnumerable<T>` generic type #29878
  • ExecuteUpdate throws exception when entity has an autoinclude #29976
  • Allow transfer of ownership of DbConnection from application to DbContext #24199
    8.0.0
  • ExecuteInsert (bulk insert) #29994
  • DbContext scaffold missing IndexerProperty for M2M relation after moving to EF Core 7 #29634
    7.0.3
  • Invalid singularization when scaffolding a manytomany table #29544
    7.0.3
  • NullReferenceException scaffolding when no primary key set #29516
    7.0.3
  • Add-Migration fails with "An item with the same key has already been added" when renaming entity #27504
    7.0.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Scaffolding: Clean up code generation tests #29995

Merged

  • Updating SQLitePCLRaw library versions to 2.1.3 as it has ppc64le sup… #29783
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Remove unnecessary dependency on MS.CA.VB package #29986
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3 #29835
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3 #29836
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Allow transfer of ownership of DbConnection from application to DbContext #29960
    providers-beware
  • Bump Castle.Core from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 #29964
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Scaffold [ForeignKey] and [InverseProperty] when principal key is alternate key #29449
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix code for EF6 many-to-many pattern #29793
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Handle FK on keyless entity type #29779
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Working implementation of precompiled queries #29949
  • Don't duplicate query filter parameters #29422

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • When installing .NET 7.0 SDK, some packages' version are 6.0 not 7.0 #13127
  • [macOS] Visual Studio 2022 for Mac Preview - BUG #13337
  • Installing wasm-tools workload with .NET 7 Preview 2 fails to update the advertising manifests #14255
  • [NETE2ESDK] With .NET 8.0 SDK zip installed on windows, showing a redundant .NET Runtime #15209

Updated

  • Questions about README #14364

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove tarball verbiage from source-build infrastructure #15217
  • Generate version for Roslyn packages #15216
  • Update the src/SourceBuild readme #15214

Merged

  • Re-enable all source-build scenario tests #15203
  • Remove aspnetcore source-build patch #15213
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #15202

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Eliminate runtime portable build #14816
    Area-SourceBuild
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add CI for building with N-1 source-built SDK #15164
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Force /p:PortableBuild=true, for cases where we overrode the RID. #15163
    Area-SourceBuild
